revised_title: Investigation of Muscle Plasma Coagulation and its Factors
tldr: The author investigates the coagulation of muscle plasma and its factors. They discover that the process of coagulation is reversible and depends on the concentration of salt in the system. The author also finds that the addition of a small amount of sodium chloride to muscle is sufficient to create a coagulable plasma.
